verses.name: Revelation 21:22
verses.text: And I saw no temple therein: for the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are the temple of it.

verses.name: Revelation 21:23
verses.text: And the city had no need of the sun, neither of the moon, to shine in it: for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.

verses.name: Revelation 21:24
verses.text: And the nations of them which are saved shall walk in the light of it: and the kings of the earth do bring their glory and honour into it.

verses.name: Revelation 21:25
verses.text: And the gates of it shall not be shut at all by day: for there shall be no night there.
